comments.body: Must have
There already is a stamina bar that is hidden, that's why you lose hunger faster depending on what you do.
Plz tell me here what you think of this idea and any other ideas related to it

Picture this: You want to light up a big dark area, but you have no idea what is in there. So, you pull out your torch launcher, and throw a light source deep into the middle of the area. Suddenly, you can see all the monsters that would have killed you if you had stepped in blindly! Now, with the ability to see, you can fight the monsters and light up the rest of the area the normal way.

The torch launcher would not cause damage, and it probably shouldn't be like a catapult, because mojang says they don't want catapults I think. What if it was like an atlatl, a device with durability that lets you throw the item in your offhand really far? If it doesn't have a specific use, it would just drop the item, but if it was, say, a torch, it would land and light up the area, or if it was an ender pearl, it would teleport you, or an arrow would cause damage. It would just launch items, not as far as a bow or crossbow, but farther than dropping them out of your inventory. It would be great to throw things!
Why haven’t other people voted this?!!! This is amazing!
What would that do?
i get where this person is coming from but i would of not called it silk touch boats i would of called it boots that do not destroy crops
deadlykiller091 it means that without it and you jump on crops they are destroyed but when you have it when you jump on crops it is not destroyed
Also add that they don't make noise and dont activate the sound activated block.
I think adding this functionality to feather falling would be better
Maybe make it a redstone block? Different outputs dependent on the fullness of the moon? I'm sure some Redstone guru like Mumbo Jumbo could find a use for it.
I think using amethyst rather than making a whole new ore can make amethyst more important, rather than just for a block and a spyglass.
This would indeed be a neat feature in minecraft but very unneeded.

I do not think that this would be a great feature. I have never heard of a "Portable Furnace" because it doesn't exist. This is definitely a new idea i've never heard of. And it is quite illogical. Do we have portable ovens in real life? I don't think so. And Minecraft is set in the Medieval era and at that time there was no such inventions. I will say that this is a interesting idea, I am not trying to be rude. I just don't see this in Minecraft. A Portable furnace is not very Mincerafty. But don't feel sad, you can always use a combination of Minecarts and Furnaces for a rather nice Furnace system that can transfer goods. Thank you.

As long as you can only use one of them at once and it has some sort of downside as well, I think that this would be a welcome addition to the game. The downside could be requiring twice as much fuel, or taking twice as long to smelt the item. If you could use more than one though, it would be too overpowered. Cool idea! :D
You can all choose end furnace like end chest cookes even if broken or has a donwside
So a slab on its side, right?
The eggs would be displayed on the block like a Brewing Stand. The eggs may be 2D like usual or 3D like Turtle/Dragon eggs.
The Dragon Egg may be able to be used in this, although I am not sure how. Currently, I am not a fan of the idea of the Dragon Egg hatching into another Ender Dragon.
Scutes would be an ingredient to make one step of the Turtle Spawn Egg, Turtle Shells may do multiple steps, and using a Turtle Egg would immediately create a Turtle Spawn Egg

Using that logic, however, that could imply that you use chicken eggs on a chicken egg to get a Chicken Spawn Egg, but I wouldn't want that as it would be circular and pretty much allow you to have infinite chickens and eggs.
Certain Spawn Eggs may still be unobtainable in Survival Mode
This could also be used with patterns to make simple easter eggs
Unfinished Spawn Eggs may have a small chance to spawn their mob
I wonder if Spawn Eggs should be thrown like normal eggs. Maybe Unfinished Spawn Eggs will retain that ability
oh that's really interesting. it'd be like a pillow fight but in minecraft. i like this idea

I agree! I'm making a build right now using brick stairs as a roof, and I really wish I had cracked bricks for texturing. It would also be nice because we have other brick blocks that have cracked versions.
maybe there could be different colors of wrapping paper depending on the color of dye you used
Patterns could also be used
Great idea that there should be patterns as well.
This is incredibly niche.
good idea, maybe you could do it by adding a banner to the wrapping paper

I'd like if it did little damage but high knockback and then stun who you hit. For player they would not be able to move and would have foggy vision and for mobs they would not be able to move either. Both would have like little birds circling above their heads like in cartoons.
A harp sound effect would be amazing to have.
Right???
It's a medieval fantasy game.

I would call this Soil. It would essentially be the opposite of Coarse Dirt, making it so planta grow faster on it
YESSSS watching grass spread is like the worst thing to do in Minecraft (especially in Skyblock) why would anyone not vote for this??

The turret will need a reserve of arrows to work, so I think replacing the middle wooden slab by a dispenser would make more sense.
Or it will be necessary to put one under the turret to supply the turret of arrows. Instead of the dispenser, it will be necessary to put in the craft a redstone powder to supply the turret.

 

Another idea I think would be to do as for to the dispenser, but which would have a rotation capacity to shoot on the mobs around.
The dispenser needs a bow to by craft, so there could be another variation with the crossbow.

 

To enable the turret you just need an active redstone circuit.
It sounds like you're describing a ballista, and I think this was suggested in a YouTube video, if I remember correctly.
There could also be enchantments for instantly chiseling things. Instead of dropping the block it would simply replace it
The above idea could be found in Archaeological Sites
There may be multiple enchantments for chiseling and cracking blocks
Going back to the actual topic of this post, I like the idea of Flame Pickaxes but not the name as much. Perhaps an enchantment called "Smelter" or "Blast?"
Also, if coal ores are mined with this pickaxe, they should drop nothing, as if the coal was burned up. Mining coal ores could also replenish the items durability, as if providing more fuel
I get what you mean but that would remove the desirability from traveling to get certain wood and Minecraft encourages traveling.

The low accuracy is to balance out the high damage potential, and ability to damage multiple mobs, that fireworks have.
I agree, You can make paint ball with fireworks on java, but this needs to be fixed to work on bedrock.
Its like impossible to aim properly at mobs below you with fireworks. Considering the amount of gunpowder needed to get really good fireworks, it should be a lot easier to aim.
